item.title: Loading Fonts and Icons Asynchronously
item.author: trevor.ryan.mccormick@gmail.com (Trevor McCormick)
item.description: The Difference Between Synchronous and Asynchronous Loading After you type in the URL to a website, some administrative magic happens behind the scenes. Here is a sketch of my entire website build, with the browser’s request and download happening on the left side of the image: When you load a website, you can use Chrome’s DevTools to view how your browser is downloading, organizing, and delivering content from a website to your browser.
